GET_DOUBLEJUMP_1: Fabled feather down, layered within the cloak. Invert gravity once more while airborne.
GET_DOUBLEJUMP_2: Make dormant or reawaken this powerful ability in the mod options menu.
INV_DESC_DRESS_DJ_ON: Protective garb lined with the uplifting down of a Fayforn and sewn through with flexible spines. Its fabled power is awoken.
INV_DESC_DRESS_DJ_OFF: Protective garb lined with the uplifting down of a Fayforn and sewn through with flexible spines. Its fabled power lies dormant.
INV_DESC_DRESS_DJ_EXTRA: When awakened from the mod options menu, hold DOWN to suppress the ability and float.
